metric.originalName: SQL language elements varaitons between Db2 to Sql server
metric.english: This quality rule searches for following SQL language elements inside SQL files: like CONCAT, ... The list of SQL language elements from DB2 to SQL Server searched can be configured in parsedefine.xml at the root of the extension. The Rulename is "SQL_language_elements".

metric.originalName: Data type mapping between Db2 to SQL server
metric.english: This quality rule searches for following Data type inside SQL files: BLOB, CLOB, DBCLOB, DECFLOAT, DOUBLE ,GRAPHIC, LONG VARCHAR, NCLOB, TIMESTAMP, VARGRAPHIC, NVARCHAR. The list of Data type searched can be configured in parsedefine.xml at the root of the extension. The Rulename is "Data_type_mapping".

metric.originalName: Db2 SQL functions variations between Db2 to SQL server
metric.english: This quality rule searches for following SQL functions inside SQL files: CHAR, CURRENT DATE, CURRENT_DATE, DAYOFWEEK_ISO, INT, LOCATE,SMALLINT, SUBSTR, USER. The list of SQL functions searched can be configured in parsedefine.xml at the root of the extension. The Rulename is "Db2_SQL_functions".
